DOC.brief_summary: Traditional Chinese Medicine ( TCM ) practitioner believe health maintain body balance ying-yang qi flow correct strength quality along meridians.Stimulation acupoints acupuncture awaken modulate qi channel able regulate restore yin-yang balance.However , drawback associate acupuncture may limit application . These include transmission infectious disease , pneumothorax problem associate organ puncture , cardiac tamponade , broken needle remnant migrate locations.Studies show TENS applied acupoints ( Acu-TENS ) , effective reduce dyspnoea patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , facilitate early haemodynamic recovery open-heart surgery , relieve labor pain , increase blood β-endorphin level , reduce blood pressure change normal healthy subject decrease airway resistance.Despite promising result , Acu-TENS work still remain unclear.This study aim investigate effect Acu-TENS Hegu ( LI4 ) Quichi ( LI4 ) autonomic nervous system activity investigate whether subject could experience distinct sensation deqi .
DOC.brief_title: Is Acupoints Sensation Necessary Acu-TENS Elicit Physiological Changes Healthy Subjects ?
DOC.detailed_description: Eligibility criterion : Normal healthy subject naïve Acu-TENS able read Chinese . Outcome Measures : Heart rate , Mean arterial blood pressure , Heart rate variability
DOC.criteria: Normal healthy subject naïve AcuTENS able read Chinese recruit study history cardiopulmonary , neurological psychologic disorder require take drug within one week might affect cardiovascular neurological status
